data.title: TELTEC International GmbH
data.meta_description: Areas of Expertise - TELTEC International GmbH
data.text:
Unrivaled Expertise

Competence centre with a unique pool of experts

TELTEC, a leading specialist in the semiconductor industry, occupies a unique position in the field. The mediation and procurement of high-tech machines from Asia and the USA provides medium-sized manufacturers, in particular, with quick and uncomplicated access to the European market. Renowned chip manufacturers such as Infineon or STMicroelectronics simultaneously benefit from an innovative and versatile portfolio.

Expertise for excellence

Global players in the semiconductor industry benefit from an innovative portfolio

After a successful sale, TELTEC takes over the entire service management for the delivered machines, including installation, programming, training, maintenance and other services - all for an optimised production process.

It goes without saying that the engineers receive intensive training by the manufacturers and are kept up to date with the latest technology. The owner-managed company is now in an even better position to focus on the needs of customers and suppliers. The new structure creates the best conditions to fully exploit the many opportunities within the expanding semiconductor technology market.
